The 4th & final stop on today’s T&I Tour was the 18th & Central Intersection in KCK. Improvements here included a reconfigured intersection, upgraded traffic signals, ADA-compliance, and enhanced aesthetics along the Central Avenue Cooridor - leading to more econ development. pic.twitter.com/YTNyz2OgMM

The 3rd stop on our T&I Tour was the Lewis and Clark Viaduct. This $60 mil project has huge significance to our entire region, as it will connect KCK and KCMO, while  increasing access to the Fairfax Industrial area. pic.twitter.com/cIvxIgr2t5

The 2nd stop on our T&I Tour was @jocogov’s Tomahawk Creek Wastewater Treatment Facility. It’s the largest project the county has ever undertaken. When completed, it will process 19 million gallons a day and over 35 years will save the county nearly a quarter billion dollars. pic.twitter.com/9s903xcgo4

The first stop on our T&I Tour was @jocogov’s New Century Airport. A unit of Chinook helicopters are based here, as are a number of businesses. We visited the hangers and FAA tower, then toured the runway infrastructure. pic.twitter.com/T4k2Lei7wV

Today we’re kicking off our new “T&I Tour” program by visiting four different transportation and infrastructure projects throughout our community. Follow along to learn more about the work happening in #KS03.
